entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear early this evening then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers this evening and after midnight. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Low 6. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Thursday 20 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers. High 19. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the morning then 60 percent chance of showers in the afternoon. Risk of a thunderstorm in the afternoon. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High 19. UV index 7 or high. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Thursday 20 April 2023
